meanings.definition: Chufas: small, round, edible tubers used to make horchata
meanings.sent1: I planted chufas in my garden to grow tasty tubers.
meanings.sent2: The farmer harvested chufas to prepare horchata.
meanings.sent3: The chufas giggled as they turned into delicious horchata.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as a chufa dipped in horchata.
meanings.sent5: The chufas danced in the glass of horchata, ready to be enjoyed.

meanings.definition: Chufas: the plant that produces the tubers used to make horchata
meanings.sent1: The chufas plant grew tall under the warm sun.
meanings.sent2: Farmers take care of chufas plants to ensure a good harvest.
meanings.sent3: The chufas plant whispered secrets to the neighboring flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him bloomed like a chufas plant in spring.
meanings.sent5: The chufas plant stood proudly, providing ingredients for horchata.
